column4: I'm having some trouble burning a data DVD with my compaq laptop's internal burner in 9.04. I have tried GnomeBaker and Brasero. any ideas?
i have found both of those programs so buggy that I default back to k3b. What are the specific issues?
schnetf, Brasero ejects after  a minute creating image but before burning and gnomebaker just throws up an error immediately saying image couldn't be made
schnetf, i'll give k3b a quick try :) thanks
